channel.title: IBM MQ channel name for connection

collect_channel_config.title: Enable collection of channel configuration metrics

collect_queue_config.title: Enable collection of queue configuration metrics

collect_reset_queue_stats.title: Enable collection of queue statistics (destructive operation)

collect_statistics_queue.title: Enable collection of statistics queue metrics (SYSTEM.ADMIN.STATISTICS.QUEUE provides advanced metrics like min/max depth)

collect_sys_topics.title: Enable collection of $SYS topic metrics (provides Queue Manager CPU, memory, and log utilization)

collect_system_channels.title: Enable collection of system channel metrics (SYSTEM.* channels show clustering and administrative health)

collect_system_listeners.title: Enable collection of system listener metrics (SYSTEM.* listeners show internal connectivity)

collect_system_queues.title: Enable collection of system queue metrics (SYSTEM.* queues provide critical infrastructure visibility)

collect_system_topics.title: Enable collection of system topic metrics (SYSTEM.* topics show internal messaging patterns)

host.title: IBM MQ server hostname or IP address

max_channels.title: Maximum number of channels to collect (0 = no limit)

max_listeners.title: Maximum number of listeners to collect (0 = no limit)

max_queues.title: Maximum number of queues to collect (0 = no limit)

max_topics.title: Maximum number of topics to collect (0 = no limit)

queue_manager.title: IBM MQ Queue Manager name to connect to

statistics_interval,omitempty.title: Statistics collection interval in seconds (auto-detected STATINT overwrites this value)

sys_topic_interval,omitempty.title: $SYS topic collection interval in seconds (user override for customized MQ configurations)
